meanings.definition: A person or company that sends out bills or invoices.
meanings.sent1: The biller at the electric company sends out the monthly invoices.
meanings.sent2: The small business hired a biller to handle their billing statements.
meanings.sent3: The biller accidentally sent out double the amount of bills, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The biller's desk was stacked high with invoices, like a mountain of paperwork.
meanings.sent5: The biller's job is to make sure all bills are sent out accurately and on time.

meanings.definition: To send out bills or invoices for payment.
meanings.sent1: The company will biller their clients at the end of each month.
meanings.sent2: She will biller the customers for the services provided.
meanings.sent3: He decided to biller his friends for the pizza they ordered together.
meanings.sent4: The lawyer will biller for the hours spent working on the case.
meanings.sent5: Remember to biller the clients promptly to avoid any delays in payment.
